component.title: Relative path to the component in app directory.

title.title: Title for the <title> tag in HTML. If the text starts with the ':' the title is searched in the dictionaries without the first character.

requireAuth.title: Indicates if the route requires authorization.

layout.title: Relative path to the custom layout file from the application root.

components.title: Definition of components rendered in server DOM.

id.title: ID of the HTML element in server DOM.

component.title: Relative path to the component from app directory.

auto.title: Indicates if the component's wrapper should be automatically rendered in the layout's body.

socketClassDir.title: Relative to the directory with socket classes from application root.

errorPage.title: Relative path to the Error page from the app directory.

componentProvider.title: Relative path to the ContentProvider from the app directory.

port.title: Port on which the app listens.

staticDir.title: Relative path to the static directory for the express app from the application root.

dev.title: Indicates if the application is in DEV mode.

jsDir.title: Name of the directory where the javascript is located in the staticDir

cssDir.title: Name of the directory where the css is located in the staticDir

appDir.title: Relative path to the app directory from the application root.

entryFile.title: Relative path to the entry file from the app directory.

layoutComponent.title: Relative path to the Layout component file from the application root.

secret.title: Secret which is used to sign cookies

scripts.title: List of scripts loaded in the server HTML.

styles.title: List of styles loaded in the server HTML.

mergeStyles.title: List of styles to merge to rs-app.css.

items.title: Relative path to the style from the application root.

session.title: Relative path to the Session class file from the application root.

socketMessageMaxSize.title: Maximal size of one socket message.

auth.title: Relative path to the file with exported auth function.

errorHandler.title: Relative path to the file with exported error handler function.

bundlePathRelative.title: Indicates if the bundle is loaded relatively in the server HTML.

onWebpackProgress.title: Relative path to the file with exported webpack progress function.

webpack.title: Custom webpack config. It can be object or relative path to the webpack config file.

babelTranspileModules.title: List of modules to add to the babel-loader.

createMissingComponents.title: Indicates if registered components should be created if missing.

sourceStylesDir.title: Relative path to the directory containing source styles that are merged to app styles.

connectSocketAutomatically.title: Indicates if the socket should be connected automatically after the bundle load.

default.title: Default locale of the website. This locale will be used in default.json.

anyOf.title: Path to the module or its name to require from node_modules.

items.title: Path to the module or its name to require from node_modules.

logging.title: Indicates if the server logs to the console.

handler.title: Relative path to the file with exported error handler function.

page.title: Relative path to the error page from the app directory.

layout.title: Relative path to the layout file.

bundleAfterServerStart.title: Indicates if the server should be started before the webpack bundle. In that case bundling info page is rendered.
